title: Jerrod Carmichael | Matt Gaetz Melts Down at Hearing; Trump Endorses Sarah Palin for Congress: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump endorsing Sarah Palin for a seat in Congress, Matt Gaetz accusing the military of focusing too much on "woke-ism" and Biden proposing a billionaire tax aimed at reining in America’s massive wealth gap.

Then, Jerrod Carmichael talks about hosting Saturday Night Live, coming out as gay in his Rothaniel special and the inspiration behind the special.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
